turkish_example_sentence: Biz otelden eski harita almamışsak, şehirde kaybolup dolaşırdık.
english_example_sentence: If we had not taken the old map from the hotel, we would have gotten lost and wandered in the city.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы не взяли старую карту из отеля, мы бы заблудились и бродили по городу.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz otelden eski harita ______, şehirde kaybolup dolaşırdık.
